sqlMap.select: select PAYPLATFORM_NOTICE_ID, BIZID, NOTICE_TYPE, TRADE_TIME, RESPONSE_MSG, OPERATE_DATE from RL_PAYPLATFORM_NOTICE where PAYPLATFORM_NOTICE_ID = #payplatformNoticeId:DECIMAL#
sqlMap.insert:
select SEQ_BASIC_INFO.NEXTVAL as value from dual
insert into RL_PAYPLATFORM_NOTICE (PAYPLATFORM_NOTICE_ID, BIZID, NOTICE_TYPE, TRADE_TIME, RESPONSE_MSG, OPERATE_DATE) values (#payplatformNoticeId:DECIMAL#, #bizid:VARCHAR#, #noticeType:VARCHAR#, #tradeTime:TIMESTAMP#, #responseMsg:VARCHAR#, #operateDate:TIMESTAMP#)
sqlMap.update: update RL_PAYPLATFORM_NOTICE set BIZID = #bizid:VARCHAR#, NOTICE_TYPE = #noticeType:VARCHAR#, TRADE_TIME = #tradeTime:TIMESTAMP#, RESPONSE_MSG = #responseMsg:VARCHAR#, OPERATE_DATE = #operateDate:TIMESTAMP# where PAYPLATFORM_NOTICE_ID = #payplatformNoticeId:DECIMAL#
